titleStmt.title: The oppressed mans importunate and mournfull cryes to be brought to the barre of iustice, or, An epistle writ by Lievt. Col. John Lilburne (without all shadow of law and iustice, imprisoned in the Tower of London) ...
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, with an addition reprinted the 18 Aprill, 1648.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
